description:
Brazil Sensations specializes in the organization of meetings, seminars and workshops throughout Brazil.

Research, negotiation and management of venues (hotels, convention centers, unusual or exceptional locations), proposals for professional audiovisual solutions, customized culinary offerings, management of internal and external participants and speakers: all this makes up the day-to-day work of our MICE “Meetings, Incentives, Congress and Events” team.

The organization of conferences as well as the management of participants at national and international congresses is at the heart of Brazil Sensations’ know-how. From rigorous logistics (management of hotel staff and room lists, registration, search for speakers) to the complete organization of congresses and symposiums, the management of all audiovisual technology, posters and innovative digital solutions.

Whether your event is for 100 people or 2,000 participants, our team will be able to provide you with personalized service.
